function.name: volume_increase
function.description: This function is used to increase the volume of a smart home appliance or device.

location.description: The location where the device for which volume needs to be increased is located.

room.description: The room where the air conditioner is located. e.g. living room, bedroom, bathroom, etc.

device.description: The name or type of the device on which the volume needs to be increased.

volume.description: The amount by which the volume needs to be increased for the device.
